name: Blue Microphones Snowball ICE - Microphone - USB - Black | Dell USA
description: It's never been easier to get high quality audio with your computer! Home, office, anywhere - the Snowball iCE USB microphone delivers audio quality that's light years ahead of your computer's built-in microphone. Its custom condenser capsule with cardioid pattern offers crystal clear audio for communicating, creating, and recording. Also Plug and Play for PC and Mac, Snowball iCE requires no drivers.
